query: CreateFrame(grid).as(["FRAME"]); Database(<<ENGINE>>) | Select(<concept>) | Filter( (<concept> == [<instance>]) ) | Import(); Panel(<SMSS_PANEL_ID>) | SetPanelView("visualization"); Select(FRAME__<concept>).as([<concept>]) | With(Panel(<SMSS_PANEL_ID>)) | Format(type=['graph'], options=[]) | TaskOptions({"<SMSS_PANEL_ID>":{"layout": "Graph", "alignment": {"start": ["<concept>"], "end":["<concept>"]}}}) | Collect(500);
